import math
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    area = n * m
    side = math.gcd(n, m)
    num_squares = area // (side * side)
    print(num_squares)

from math import gcd
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    x = gcd(a, b)
    x = x * x
    y = a * b / x
    print(int(y))

def all_factors(n):
    f_list = [x for x in range(1, n // 2 + 1) if n % x == 0]
    f_list.append(n)
    return f_list
T = int(input())
for t in range(0, T):
    (N, M) = map(int, input().split())
    n_factors = all_factors(N)
    m_factors = all_factors(M)
    gcf = max(set(n_factors) & set(m_factors))
    n_plots = M * N // (gcf * gcf)
    print(n_plots)

import math
T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    side = math.gcd(n, m)
    print(int(n * m // math.pow(side, 2)))
